title: Adelle Kehoe Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Adelle Kehoe? Check out all of Adelle Kehoe's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogAdelle Kehoe Director of Content Marketing Adelle Kehoe Adelle is Similarweb’s content marketing director, and she loves - you guessed it - all things content. With a background in content creation, SEO, marketing and comms, she has helped companies large and small grow their online presence with a content-first approach. Her work has been featured in national newspapers and she is a keen contributor in content communities, such as FINITE. When she’s not waxing lyrical about Similarweb and content, she can be found reading, fussing over her cat and teaching pottery.
